entry.data:
CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
PATCHY FOG
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 40
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
AREAS OF FOG IN THE EVENING, THEN PATCHY FOG AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 40
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE MORNING
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

RAIN AND SNOW LIKELY
LIGHT SNOW ACCUMULATION POSSIBLE
LOWS AROUND 30
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 70 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE MORNING
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SNOW
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 50 PERCENT
